card.text: Harriet Augusta Newcomb presented the Old Town Hall to the town in 1882.
The Building acted as a community center, holding various events.
By 1947 the building had fallen into disrepair. In 1949 the town clerk, treasure and collector had an office in the Town Hall.
The college bought the building in 1982 and used it as storage.
The College sold the building in 1986 to only be bought back in 1990.
Old Town Hall Bookstore opened in 1992.
